name: Phastr
body:
###Web App building is about performance and productivity

The only framework that makes it feel like eating cake

_**First** in security, performance, simplicity and flexibility_

_**It really whips the secondsâ€™ ass!**_

* Security-first
* Hardened RMR architecture
* Lighting MVC footprint
* File-based/PDO
* Ajax-ready
* Form builder/validator
* Extensive templating
* Flexible vocabulary/multi-language support
* Integrated Bootstrap front-end framework

###Status

[Alpha] _Under active development_ : [demo](//demo.wiframework.org)

###Todos

1. Documentation
2. Lots of beauty
3. All the wonders

***

/ [SourceForce](//sourceforce.pro) / Phastr
